title: Role Stealer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use an ability from a quoted role.
- Silence someone, making them unable to talk in day chat. They may still whisper

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Quoted role means any role that is directly mentioned during the day. Rule 17 does not apply, but roles you mention don't count.
- Every day, you must make a new role based off a message or group of messages sent in the day chat. Failure to do so will modkill you. The message(s) it's based off of must be included in the flavor text.
- If this spawns Quoter (3819) also spawns, overriding a role slot if neccessary.
- If your are currently in a state of winning, Quoter may not win.
